Package model

Class House

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.House
public class House extends Entity
House represents an obstruction to the invaders (and even the player). The house has a set hp value and will graphically look more damaged as it loses hp.

      Construct house.
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate to
      x - absolute x to spawn at (children centered)

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Should be overriden to add functionality for game tick updates. If instantiated, the game will be able to call this method on every game update. Will not be called as soon as it is deleted with .delete().
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity

    • damage

      public void damage(int amount)
      Damage the house by a given amount. Subtracting the hp.
      Parameters:
      amount - to decrease by
